thread.title: From “dimming the sun” to an Ozempic-fueled stock market shakeup and the US taking a stance on AI. — BRIAR PRESTIDGE
thread.title_full: From “dimming the sun” to an Ozempic-fueled stock market shakeup and the US taking a stance on AI. — BRIAR PRESTIDGE

author: Briar Prestidge
title: From “dimming the sun” to an Ozempic-fueled stock market shakeup and the US taking a stance on AI. — BRIAR PRESTIDGE
text: From “dimming the sun” to an Ozempic-fueled stock market shakeup and the US taking a stance on AI. ☀️ Hold up, are we seriously talking about “dimming” THE SUN? Researchers are looking into [Solar Radiation Management (SRM)](https://tinyurl.com/2et2dvhb), a process of introducing aerosols into the stratosphere to block solar radiation from reaching our planet and keeping it cooler: [https://tinyurl.com/2et2dvhb](https://tinyurl.com/2et2dvhb) 💸 Sam Bankman-Fried, who once ran one of the world's biggest cryptocurrency exchanges, has [been found guilty of fraud and money laundering](https://tinyurl.com/ypdpvwtm) at the end of a month-long trial: [https://tinyurl.com/ypdpvwtm](https://tinyurl.com/ypdpvwtm) 🥊 Alright guys, pack it up, nothing to see here: Elon Musk stated on the Joe Rogan Experience podcast that the [fight with Mark Zuckerberg is not happening](https://tinyurl.com/2kd9uym9): [https://tinyurl.com/2kd9uym9](https://tinyurl.com/2kd9uym9) 🚗 The façade of the gig economy continues to dissipate: Uber and Lyft will pay a combined $328 million to settle claims by New York's attorney general that the ride-sharing companies systematically [cheated drivers out of pay and benefits](https://tinyurl.com/yc683vw8): [https://tinyurl.com/yc683vw8](https://tinyurl.com/yc683vw8) 🤖 ICYMI: American President Joe Biden has issued a landmark [Executive Order](https://tinyurl.com/2jup4umv) to ensure that the US leads the way in seizing the promise and managing the risks of AI: [https://tinyurl.com/2jup4umv](https://tinyurl.com/2jup4umv) 🌎 A planetary collision with Earth [4.5 million years ago](https://tinyurl.com/3sbykcw5) not only created the Moon, but also resulted in two large, mysterious blobs in Earth’s mantle that have baffled scientists for years: [https://tinyurl.com/3sbykcw5](https://tinyurl.com/3sbykcw5) Crypto is truly a pariah: Three months after launching their USD-pegged stablecoin PYUSD, PayPal has now [received a subpoena](https://tinyurl.com/bduav3fk) from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission: [https://tinyurl.com/bduav3fk](https://tinyurl.com/bduav3fk) 🧠 3D-printed brain tissue? Researchers have employed [bioprinting technology to create 3D nerve networks](https://tinyurl.com/49u6tebd) that mimic the intricate architecture of the brain's cortex in unprecedented detail: [https://tinyurl.com/49u6tebd](https://tinyurl.com/49u6tebd) 📉 Ozempic causes stock shock? The popular weight loss and diabetes treatment is becoming so popular among Americans, that the share prices of snack makers, fast food chains, and even some airlines are on a [downward spiral](https://tinyurl.com/3yk5b65j): [https://tinyurl.com/3yk5b65j](https://tinyurl.com/3yk5b65j) 🚀 Keeping it local: Researchers and space agencies such as NASA have been actively investigating methods for [producing essential supplies beyond Earth](https://tinyurl.com/49u6tebd). The answer? 3D printing: [https://tinyurl.com/49u6tebd](https://tinyurl.com/49u6tebd) 🦋 A big break for psychedelic treatments? Psychedelic drugs have been [undergoing a major makeover in psychiatry](https://tinyurl.com/355vb5k5), earning mainstream acceptance that has eluded them for decades: [https://tinyurl.com/355vb5k5](https://tinyurl.com/355vb5k5) 📺 The monopoly grows: Disney is [purchasing Comcast’s stake in popular streaming service Hulu](https://tinyurl.com/4pu5nefh), effectively adding it to the media giant’s endless list of acquired properties: [https://tinyurl.com/4pu5nefh](https://tinyurl.com/4pu5nefh) 🎃 Pumpkins: Halloween’s fruit of choice, the best candidate for making Jack-O-Lanterns, and… a [drought-tolerant, nutritious superfood](https://tinyurl.com/ym3ap7eh) in disguise? [https://tinyurl.com/ym3ap7eh](https://tinyurl.com/ym3ap7eh) This week I’m curious about… 💬 This Quote “You can avoid reality, but you cannot avoid the consequences of avoiding reality.” —Ayn Rand 🔍 This Conversation Should we prioritize making Mars a new home for humans, or protect its natural state and uniqueness? 🗣️ This HYPERSCALE Podcast Guest “We are just at the beginning of the magic and the horror of AI. We are going to see incredible magical things happen, and we’re going to see horrible, horrific things that AI can do, because it’s reflecting who we are.” ―Gray Scott Full episode here: [https://tinyurl.com/2t4j2z6n](https://tinyurl.com/2t4j2z6n) 📚 This Book: [The Ghost in the Machine](https://www.amazon.com/Ghost-Machine-Arthur-Koestler/dp/1939438349) by Arthur Koestler
